org.descripter.js.api

Class Thrown

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.Throwable
      • java.lang.Exception
        • java.lang.RuntimeException
          • org.descripter.js.api.Thrown
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, Value

    public final class Thrown
extends java.lang.RuntimeException
implements Value

    Wraps values to emulate JavaScript throwables.

    Since:
    Descripter 1.0
    Author:
    J.J.Liu (Jianjun Liu) at http://www.descripter.org
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
